remarks: The unit element of a ring is unique.  (Contributed by NM, 4-Apr-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 21-Dec-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
ringi.1 $e |- G = ( 1st ` R ) $.
ringi.2 $e |- H = ( 2nd ` R ) $.
ringi.3 $e |- X = ran G $.
rngoideu $p |- ( R e. RingOps -> E! u e. X A. x e. X ( ( u H x ) = x /\ ( x H u ) = x ) ) $.
$d G u x $.
$d H u x $.
$d R u x $.
$d X u x $.
$d u x $.
